question_stem.en: {{exhibit_1}}A patient presents with the following symptoms and lab results. {{exhibit_2}}Which of the following changes are most likely to occur after administration of high-dose dexamethasone in this patient?
question_stem.zh: {{exhibit_1}}患者出现以下症状和实验室检查结果。{{exhibit_2}}在该患者中，给予大剂量地塞米松后最有可能发生以下哪种变化？

question.en: Which of the following changes are most likely to occur after administration of high-dose dexamethasone in this patient?
question.zh: 在该患者中，给予大剂量地塞米松后最有可能发生以下哪种变化？

E.en: ACTH: No change, Cortisol: No change

explanation.en: Pituitary sources of ACTH are only relatively resistant to feedback inhibition, and high doses of dexamethasone will suppress ACTH and cortisol levels (Choice A). Nonpituitary ectopic sources of ACTH (eg, small cell lung cancer) are completely resistant to feedback inhibition, and ACTH and cortisol will remain elevated following high doses of dexamethasone.
explanation.zh: 垂体来源的促肾上腺皮质激素 (ACTH) 对反馈抑制的抵抗力相对较弱，大剂量地塞米松将抑制 ACTH 和皮质醇水平（选项 A）。非垂体异位 ACTH 来源（例如，小细胞肺癌）完全抵抗反馈抑制，大剂量地塞米松后 ACTH 和皮质醇仍将升高。

summary.en: High-dose dexamethasone suppression test helps differentiate between pituitary and ectopic sources of ACTH. Pituitary sources are relatively resistant to feedback inhibition, and high doses of dexamethasone will suppress ACTH and cortisol levels. Ectopic sources are completely resistant, and ACTH and cortisol will remain elevated.
summary.zh: 大剂量地塞米松抑制试验有助于区分 ACTH 的垂体来源和异位来源。垂体来源对反馈抑制的抵抗力相对较弱，大剂量地塞米松将抑制 ACTH 和皮质醇水平。异位来源完全抵抗，ACTH 和皮质醇仍将升高。
